ASI Data Science | Senior Software Engineer | London | Onsite, Visa Sponsorship Available, http://www.asidatascience.com/careers

ASI is building a truly innovative data science platform (sherlockml.com), capable of handling petabyte-scale data analysis. Used both internally by our data science consultants and provided as a service to our clients, you will be building the product that drives ASIâ€™s growth over the coming years.
